positionalArguments.name: <read-db.meryl>
positionalArguments.description: k-mer counts of the read set

positionalArguments.name: <mat.meryl>
positionalArguments.description: k-mer counts of the maternal haplotype (ex. mat.only.meryl or mat.hapmer.meryl)

positionalArguments.name: <pat.meryl>
positionalArguments.description: k-mer counts of the paternal haplotype (ex. pat.only.meryl or pat.hapmer.meryl)

positionalArguments.name: <asm1.fasta>
positionalArguments.description: Assembly fasta file (ex. pri.fasta, hap1.fasta or maternal.fasta)

positionalArguments.name: [asm2.fasta]
positionalArguments.description: Additional fasta file (ex. alt.fasta, hap2.fasta or paternal.fasta)
